attributes.action: Review the green credentials of the EU
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If the EU were real believers in green issues then the message should be, 'Local people for local jobs', How do they square encouraging mass migration with all the fuel and associated costs to the environment?

Amend EU law to encourage local businesses to employ local people and encourage them to train local people instead of bringing skills from abroad.

If people were employed on a local basis there would be a significant benefit to the environment.
